import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import styled from 'styled-components'; const CompletedContainer = styled.div` width:100%; height:25%; display:flex; flex-direction: row; border-color:#282c34; `; const NumberContainer = styled.div` width:33%; height:100%; `; const CompletedNumber = styled.h1` color:#282c34; font-size:2rem; `; const CompletedText = styled.h2` color:#282c34; font-size:.75rem; padding:10px; margin-top:-3vh; `; class Modal extends React.Component { render() { // Render nothing if the "show" prop is false if(!this.props.show) { return null; } return (

); } } Modal.propTypes = { onClose: PropTypes.func.isRequired, show: PropTypes.bool, children: PropTypes.node }; export default Modal;
